relation: I agree I am given the education and the knowledge equivalent to the dollar amount that I spent on my past courses, because with the motivation and drive to want to be successful I have noticed and big increase on where my life is headed just from attending this college. I went from working and a fast food shop to landing a job at an insurance company something I would have never been exposed to if I was not so active at my school.

Valencia has plenty of opportunities and events that allow the student body to have fun and even help out the community. There are picnics, live bands, and fund raisers for causes such as breast cancer to cleft lips. I even had the chance to participate in a fundraiser to help victims of trafficking in April of 2011.

I love the array of food choices. It works perfectly having class 3 days a week and being able to have a panini one day, chicken fingers and fries, the next, and even cheese danishes for a morning snack. I enjoy leaving from my morning class knowing I can look forward to an enjoyable lunch.

Dorm life is what you make of it, I enjoy it for my personal time to sit aside either finish homework assignments or vision future career plans. The campus has plenty of places to seek any information you need from resources in the library to the answer center.
Very strict. All teachers, and professors keep us focused on getting our education, and communicate with us very well their expectations of us.
Study, study, study. Always be punctual for each and every class. Never taken education for granted it is the one thing no one can ever take away from you.

Valencia is the perfect place for accomplishing goals and becoming successful. This school has helped me transition from high school to college and live a more adult structured lifestyle. I feel Valencia has also helped me jump start my future.
pageTitle: Valencia College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {674381=Valencia was named the number college in the nation, in the year of 2012. Instead of raising their cost of tuition like every other college or university, Valencia decided to keep their tuition affordable for students so they kept it at 99.06 per credit hour. They really care for the d]students and they offer so many programs for them, either its tutoring programs or scholarship programs they want everyone a chance to attend college and succeed., 466008=Valencia has plenty of opportunities and events that allow the student body to have fun and even help out the community. There are picnics, live bands, and fund raisers for causes such as breast cancer to cleft lips. I even had the chance to participate in a fundraiser to help victims of trafficking in April of 2011., 633278=Valencia College is my house since 2011 and it will be always. This is the place my journey started., 769802=Valencia college offers great opportunities for student success. There are always advisor on campus for any need a student may have. I graduate this december and i will transfer to UCF easily thanks to Valencia's Direct Connect to UCF program., 356967=I have been blessed with scholarships and pell grants so technically I have not paid anything out of pocket. But if I found myself having to do so I'd be paying roughly $1200.00-1400.00 per semester for a full time schedule., 703953=Valencia is a very well kept school. It was very Spacious yet cozy when it came to the one-on-one relations with students and teachers from what I saw. I really don't know that much about Valencia so far. however, what I've seen already has me anxious and excited for Spring Semester 2013., 320741=Every year on October 13Th, Valencia campuses celebrate Matador Day which is there mascot. They have tons of free food and activities available to all the students, to just have fun and enjoy being a Valencia Student, 951051=Winner of the 2012 Aspen Award and it shows. Great school, there are many different avenues for support and the class sizes are small. It is very affordable and it challenges you every step of the way., 507844=Valencia College is outstanding, which is why it won the 2011 Aspen Prize for Community College Excellence!, 557255=Valencia is simply wonderful. The winner of the Aspen Award for 2011 for Community College Excellence. I highly, highly recommend anyone going.}

textAfterTable: I can learn so much at Valencia, and it doesn't cost that much. I have friends who complain about prices at other colleges, but thanks to Valencia's fantastic prices, I can afford to go to college. In fact, I plan on taking as many required classes as I can at Valencia because they're so inexpensive. Am enjoying being here I was scared about college before I started going to Valencia. However, now I know that Valencia will help me with anything I'm having problems with, and they will do it in a manner that makes my education fun and profitable. Valencia is a comfortable and enjoyable learning environment. Am learning a lot Valencia is an awesome college. I can learn well in the environment they have created. Their environment is friendly and fun. The teachers are experienced and are eager to impart their knowledge. If I have any problems, they have tutors and workshops and an answer center. They help me learn the things I need to know. Login to rate or flag the reviews Endia from Tampa, FL 12/27/2009 Reviewer is
